result.eng: A light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.
result.ga: d'fhan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a chuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faobhar ar a cruthaíocht
result.orig: d'fhan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a chuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faobhar ar a cruthaíocht

result.ponchtml: d'ḟan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a ċuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faoḃar ar a cruṫaíoċtA light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.
